member.name: T:Watch.Manager.ApiService.Extensions.ArticleEndpoints
member.summary: Provides extension methods for mapping article-related endpoints to a .

member.name: M:Watch.Manager.ApiService.Extensions.ArticleEndpoints.MapArticleEndpoints(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.WebApplication)
member.summary: Configures the application's endpoints for managing articles, including operations for saving, searching, retrieving thumbnails, and getting all tags.
member.param: The instance to which the article endpoints will be added.

member.name: T:Watch.Manager.ApiService.Extensions.CategoryEndpoints
member.summary: Provides extension methods for mapping category-related endpoints to a .
member.remarks: This class defines a set of endpoints for managing categories, including operations such as retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting categories, as well as assigning and removing categories from articles. The endpoints are grouped under the "api/categories" route and support additional operations like fetching root categories and their children.

member.name: M:Watch.Manager.ApiService.Extensions.CategoryEndpoints.MapCategoryEndpoints(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.WebApplication)
member.summary: Configures the application's endpoints for managing categories, including operations for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting categories, as well as assigning and removing categories from articles.
member.param: The instance to which the category endpoints will be added.

member.name: T:Watch.Manager.ApiService.Extensions.ClassificationEndpoints
member.summary: Provides extension methods for configuring endpoints related to article classification.
member.remarks:
This class defines a set of endpoints for managing article classification operations, including:
Classifying individual articles.
Automatically assigning categories to articles based on classification results.
Batch classification of multiple articles.
Providing suggestions for new categories based on uncategorized articles.
Submitting feedback to improve classification accuracy.
These endpoints are added to the application's routing pipeline and are grouped under the "/api/classification" base path.

member.name: M:Watch.Manager.ApiService.Extensions.ClassificationEndpoints.MapClassificationEndpoints(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.WebApplication)
member.summary: Configures the application's endpoints for managing article classification, including operations for classifying articles, auto-assigning categories, batch classification, suggestions, and feedback.
member.param: The instance to which the classification endpoints will be added.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.Generated.DocumentationCommentIdHelper.CreateDocumentationId(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates a documentation comment ID for a type. Example: T:Namespace.Outer+Inner`1 becomes T:Namespace.Outer.Inner`1

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.Generated.DocumentationCommentIdHelper.CreateDocumentationId(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Generates a documentation comment ID for a property. Example: P:Namespace.ContainingType.PropertyName or for an indexer P:Namespace.ContainingType.Item(System.Int32)

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.Generated.DocumentationCommentIdHelper.CreateDocumentationId(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a documentation comment ID for a property given its container type and property name. Example: P:Namespace.ContainingType.PropertyName

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.Generated.DocumentationCommentIdHelper.CreateDocumentationId(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Generates a documentation comment ID for a method (or constructor). For example: M:Namespace.ContainingType.MethodName(ParamType1,ParamType2)~ReturnType M:Namespace.ContainingType.#ctor(ParamType)

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.Generated.DocumentationCommentIdHelper.GetTypeDocId(System.Type,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates a documentation ID string for a type. This method handles nested types (replacing '+' with '.'), generic types, arrays, pointers, by-ref types, and generic parameters. The flag controls whether constructed generic type arguments are emitted, while controls whether the generic arity marker (e.g. "`1") is appended.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.Generated.DocumentationCommentIdHelper.NormalizeDocId(System.String)
member.summary: Normalizes a documentation comment ID to match the compiler-style format. Strips the return type suffix for ordinary methods but retains it for conversion operators.
member.param: The documentation comment ID to normalize.
